mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (info_name, info_gender, info_birthday, info_email, info_address, info_age, info_img, info_desc, login_uid) values (#{infoName},#{infoGender},#{infoBirthday},#{infoEmail},#{infoAddress}, #{infoAge}, #{ingoImg},#{infoDesc},#{loginUid})
mapper.update: update userinfo set info_name = #{infoName},info_gender = #{infoGender}, info_birthday = #{infoBirthday},info_email = #{infoEmail}, info_address = #{infoAddress},info_age = #{infoAge},info_img = #{infoImg}, info_desc = #{infoDesc} where login_uid = #{loginUid}
mapper.select: select distinct u.* from userinfo u, user_status us, status s where u.login_uid = us.user_ids and us.status_ids = s.status_id and s.status_name in ('VIP用户','UP主','用户') order by info_id
